mean_cn: v. （书写）缩排，印刷；  n. 订货单
mean_en: to start a line of print or writing further away from the edge of the page than the other lines
sentence: It's a regulation to indent the first sentence of a paragraph when writing an article.
sentence_trans: 在写文章时，缩进段落的第一句话是一种规则。
word_etyma: in使 + dent牙 → indent使成犬牙状，刻成锯齿形
